public class JsonEarthquakeService

getInstance

public static JsonEarthquakeService getInstance()
Retrieves the singleton instance.

Returns:
JsonEarthquakeService

connect

public void connect()
Establishes a connection to the online service. Requires an internet connection.

Specified by:
connect in interface AbstractEarthquakeService

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Establishes that Business Search data should be retrieved locally. This does not require an internet connection.

If data is being retrieved locally, you must be sure that your parameters match locally stored data. Otherwise, you will get nothing in return.

Specified by:
disconnect in interface AbstractEarthquakeService

getClientStore

public ClientStore getClientStore()
**For internal use only!** The ClientStore is the internal cache where offline data is stored.

Returns:
ClientStore

getEarthquakes

public String getEarthquakes(Threshold threshold,
                             History time,
                             boolean recording)
                      throws EarthquakeException
Retrieves information about earthquakes around the world, and prints both the input URL and the output data.

Parameters:
threshold - What kind of earthquakes to report. Note that this is a minimum - earthquakes at or ABOVE this level will be reported!
time - The historical time range of earthquakes to report.
recording - Whether or not the inputs and outputs should be printed to stdin.
Returns:
String
Throws:
EarthquakeException

getEarthquakes

public String getEarthquakes(Threshold threshold,
                             History time)
                      throws EarthquakeException
Retrieves information about earthquakes around the world.

Parameters:
threshold - What kind of earthquakes to report. Note that this is a minimum - earthquakes at or ABOVE this level will be reported!
time - The historical time range of earthquakes to report.
Returns:
String
Throws:
EarthquakeException

getEarthquakes

public void getEarthquakes(Threshold threshold,
                           History time,
                           JsonGetEarthquakesListener callback)
Retrieves information about earthquakes around the world.

Parameters:
threshold - What kind of earthquakes to report. Note that this is a minimum - earthquakes at or ABOVE this level will be reported!
time - The historical time range of earthquakes to report.
callback - The listener that will be given the data (or error).

getInstance

public static JsonEarthquakeService getInstance(InputStream localFile)
                                         throws IOException
Retrieves the singleton instance, and if it doesn't exist, sets it to use the given local data stream.

Parameters:
localFile - A data stream that will be used instead of live data.
Returns:
Throws:
IOException
